description: Associates multiple self-service actions with provisioning artifacts.

parameters.name: ServiceActionAssociations
parameters.description: One or more associations, each consisting of the Action ID, the Product ID, and the Provisioning Artifact ID. (dict) --- A self-service action association consisting of the Action ID, the Product ID, and the Provisioning Artifact ID. The self-service action identifier. For example, act-fs7abcd89wxyz. The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa. The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

nested_params.name: ServiceActionId
nested_params.description: The self-service action identifier. For example, act-fs7abcd89wxyz.

nested_params.name: ProductId
nested_params.description: The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa.

nested_params.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

nested_items.name: FailedServiceActionAssociations
nested_items.description: An object that contains a list of errors, along with information to help you identify the self-service action.

nested_items.name: ServiceActionId
nested_items.description: The self-service action identifier. For example, act-fs7abcd89wxyz.

nested_items.name: ProductId
nested_items.description: The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code. Valid values are listed below.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A text description of the error.
